tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (SBAR (IN As) (S (SBAR (IN if) (FRAG (ADVP (IN out) (PP (IN of) (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NNS days)))))) (, ,) (NP (FW i)) (VP (VBP have) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB go) (PP (IN in) (PP (IN on) (NP (NP (PRP$ my) (NN day)) (ADVP (IN off)))))))) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB do) (NP (DT an) (NN exam)))))))))
